narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Samerawit Adagish is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Roanoke, VA. From 2023-05 through 2024-12, this provider received $190K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 565 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.1× the national median for T2003 (T2003), at $67 per claim vs. the median of $22. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
79% of billing is concentrated in T2003 (T2003), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending grew 1487% from $11K in 2023 to $179K in 2024.
Saw a 15.9× spike in 2024 ($11K → $179K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
